LaunchScreen.welcomeDescription: This launch screen provides a step-by-step guide to help you configure your application during the initial setup.
LaunchScreen.firstStep: ðŸŽ¯ First, add a subdomain and check its availability

LaunchScreen.noteDetails: Please ensure you're ready to submit the required information before starting the forms. Your data will only be saved if all required steps are completed; incomplete submissions won't be stored.

SubDomainForm.title: Sub Domain
SubDomainForm.description: The subdomain is the name of your organization. It is used to identify your organization and to create the URL for your organization.
SubDomainForm.domainFormDescription: Enter your desired subdomain for your SaaS application.
SubDomainForm.allowAdminChange: Allow administrators to change the Sub domain.
